features.name: Public Restaurant Browsing
features.description: Public views for discovering and viewing published restaurant details with optimized caching.

features.name: Vendor Restaurant Management (CRUD)
features.description: Private vendor dashboard pages for managing restaurant listings, including creation, updates, and deletion.

features.name: Media Upload Service
features.description: Client-side image upload component using Supabase Storage for venue cover images.

features.name: Multi-tenant Auth & Tenancy Control
features.description: Supabase-based authentication with RLS and vendor membership checks for data isolation.
